paper_abstract: A short overview of the developments at the Department of Engineering Cybernetics at NTNU over the last 15 years is given. The vision of the department is to stay among Europe's most well recognized universities in control engineering, both with respect to education and research. The article discusses both how this goal has been achieved and how it will continue to be strengthened in the future.
paper_title: The Department of Engineering Cybernetics at NTNU: From 1994 Into the Future
